scripts.dev:storybook: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-storybook storybook
scripts.dev:storybook:web: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-storybook storybook:web
scripts.dev:demo: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase start
scripts.dev:demo:ios: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase ios
scripts.dev:demo:android: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase android
scripts.dev:demo:web: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase web
scripts.build:storybook: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-storybook build-storybook
scripts.build:demo: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase export:web
scripts.build:all: pnpm build && pnpm build:storybook && pnpm build:demo
scripts.deploy:demo: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase publish
scripts.deploy:demo:preview: pnpm --filter zero-to-app build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app-showcase publish:preview
scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter zero-to-app publish --access public --no-git-checks
